src_original: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /  upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
tgt_original: 不可愛色起於瞋想； 非愛非惡而起捨想。

src_original: yadetanmanopratikūleṣu rūpeṣvanunītaṃ carati,  tenāsya rāga utpadyate /  pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati,
tgt_original: 如是乃至意著法處為意境界，若彼意處緣可愛色極生愛樂，為彼所牽引生貪行；

src_original: tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate /  naivānukūleṣu na pratikūleṣu saṃmūḍhaṃ carati,  tenāsya moha utpadyate /
tgt_original: 不可愛色生於瞋行； 愛非愛色起於癡行。

src_original: evaṃ śabdādiṣu trividhamālambanamanubhavati pūrvavat /
tgt_original: 如是聲等三種攀緣領納等相，准前應說。

src_original: uktaṃ caitadbhagavatā pitāputrasamāgame-  (Bcp 238)  ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣaḥ,  ṣaṭsparśāyatanaḥ,
tgt_original: 」佛言：

src_original: aṣṭādaśamanopavicāraḥ /  ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /  kiṃ caitat pratītya kam?  ṣaḍime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
tgt_original: 「大王！ 如是六界、六觸處，十八意所伺察，是補嚕沙為緣得生。

src_original: katame ṣaṭ? tadyathā- pṛthvīdhātuḥ,
tgt_original: 云何六界？

src_original: abdhātuḥ,  tejodhātuḥ,  vāyudhātuḥ,  ākāśadhātuḥ,  vijñānadhātuśca /
tgt_original: 所謂地界、水界、火界、風界、空界、識界。

src_original: ime mahārāja ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ /  yāvat ṣaḍimāni mahārāja sparśāyatanāni /  katamāni ṣaṭ?
tgt_original: 云何六觸處？

src_original: cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /  imāni mahārāja ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni /  peyālaṃ /  aṣṭādaśa ime mahārāja manaupacārāḥ /
tgt_original: 謂眼觸處而見於色，若耳觸處得聞其聲，若鼻觸處能嗅於香，若舌觸處悉嘗於味，若身觸處親覺其觸，若意觸處則知於法。

src_original: katame aṣṭādaśa?  iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /  evaṃ śrotrādiṣu vācyam /
tgt_original: 云何十八意所伺察，謂眼見色已，若生適悅，若生憂惱，若住於捨；

src_original: tena pratyekamindriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayabhedādaṣṭādaśa manaupavicārā bhavanti /  peyālaṃ /
tgt_original: 如是六根各各緣彼適悅等三，是名十八意所伺察。

src_original: katamaśca mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ?
tgt_original: 大王！ 云何為內地界？

src_original: yat kiṃcidasmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /  tat punaḥ katamat?  tadyathā- keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ityādi /
tgt_original: 謂於內身所生硬澁，髮毛爪齒，皮肉筋骨。

src_original: katamaśca mahārāja bāhyaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ?  yat kiṃcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /  ayamucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ /  tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,  nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati /
tgt_original: 若內地界不生，亦無有滅，則無集行。

src_original: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /
tgt_original: 大王！

src_original: sā adhyātmamahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati /  sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogamākāṅkṣate /
tgt_original: 若時女人，而於內心如所思惟彼補嚕沙，彼補嚕沙亦生愛樂，由二和合羯邏藍生。

src_original: puruṣo 'pi adhyātmaṃ puruṣo 'smīti kalpayatīti purvavat /  tayoḥ saṃyogākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃyogo bhavati /  saṃyogapratyayāt kalalaṃ jāyate /  tatra mahārāja yaśca saṃkalpyate,  yaśca saṃkalpayitā,
tgt_original: 又復思惟相似和合，而得生者，無有是處；

src_original: ubhayametanna saṃvidyate /  striyāṃ strī na saṃvidyate /  puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /
tgt_original: 若二女人，無有是處； 二補嚕沙，亦無是處；

src_original: iti hi asannasadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jāyate /  so 'pi saṃkalpaḥ sadbhāvena na saṃvidyate /  yathā saṃkalpaḥ,  tathā saṃyogo 'pi /  kalalamapi svabhāvena na saṃvidyate /
tgt_original: 若彼彼思惟而得生者，亦無是處。
